Title: The Curious Adventures of Mr. Wonderbird
Writer: Hans Christian Andersen (fairy tale), Paul Grimault (screenplay), Jacques Prévert (screenplay)
Actors: Pierre Brasseur, Anouk Aimée, Serge Reggiani, Max Adrian
Plot: A chimney sweep and his beloved shepherdess are aided by Wonderbird in their escape from a ruthless dictator
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.
